page.title: 08Sports Day
page.content: Every year Chandag Junior School has a {sports}day.It is usually held at the end of June.This year we were very lucky with the weather but it was very hot so that made it quite hard to race .All the events were open to all years except the{chariot}race and the mum's{ {skipping}race and the dad's{sack.}Each child races for their team_Willow, Hawthorn,Rowan or Sycamore.If you do come first,second,third or fourth,you get some team points which they write on a board and keep track of until the end of Sports Day.Then the winning team is presented with a shield which this year Willow won.We race on a field,the mums and dads come to watch. The first years have an{egg and spoon} race,the second years have a{three- } {legged}race,while the third and fourth years have{sack}races and{skipping. {Everyone}has{sprints.}
